December 11*,
Mr* Seymour Siegel,
Radio Station WNYC
Municipal Building
New York City, New York
Dear Sit
I hope we have not fouled up the Herald Tribune Forum
series-â€”or did your first paragraph in your letter of December
11 to Mrs* J. .ard Greenwood of KUOll apply to me* flhen we
received this series in one big package,1 Bill Nail'wired you
relative to disposition of them and you wired back November 16
advising us to use them and forward them to you* This we have
done*
At the Washington meeting, you said you might arrange for
me to be at the Mid-Century Speech Convention or that you
wanted me to be at the convention* It was left at that. I
was invited originally to appear on that program but turned the
invitation down. If you particularly want me to be there, let
me know right away so I can make some plans* However, Vm not
especially eager to be there at that time and my own travel
budget will not take care of a trip to New York*
I*m writing Dick for his ideas for a brochure on NAEB
and I am writing Griffith for suggestions concerning application
blanks. As soon as I have drafted a sample of each, I will
send them along to you. Meantime, if you have any ideas on
either, please let me have them*
Keep up. the good work* Let me know of anything I can do
to help*
Sincerely yours,
Graydon Ausmus, Director
Radio Broadcasting Services
Manager, WUQA(Flf)
